entry.content:
• "computer-science" tags:
  • "assembla"
  • "dev"
  • "eclipse"
  • "python"
  • "wxpython"

I don't know how much this is visible for Everyone, but I have started to publish small code snippets on assembla. I use only SVN for the moment, since I find it really useful for code development.

the wiki page of my current project. it includes a dumb printer, a credit card number generator and a tiff merger. The last two have a wxPython GUI (almost the same one).

These tools have been written using Eclipse -EasyEclipseForPython 1.2.2.2- and wxGlade

I'd wish to publish some other code before it disappears from the net (glare.it will be sent to Walhalla in the next months), perhaps the next week. stay tuned if you're interested in a webcrawler and a patch for indexing multimedia content on a semantic search engine ;-)
